name: marky-markdown
description: A funky bunch of methods for writing markdown more easily.

commands.title: Marky Markdown: Add/Update Heading Bookmark Links
Marky Markdown: Remove Heading Bookmark Links
Marky Markdown: Add/Update the Table of Contents (TOC)
Marky Markdown: Remove the Table of Contents (TOC)

markyMarkdown.heading.levelRange.description: Select the range of heading levels (from most important to least important) to which Commands are applied. For example, having a range of '2..6' includes headings from level 2 to level 6.
markyMarkdown.heading.levelRange.patternErrorMessage: Must define a range of numbers in the format of '2..6'. The numbers must be between 1 and 6. The first number should be greater than or equal to the second number.

markyMarkdown.heading.linkText.description: Customize the text for heading bookmark links.

markyMarkdown.heading.linkImagePath.description: Add an image to the heading bookmark link. If both text and an image are specified, the image will come first.

markyMarkdown.heading.slugifyMode.description: Creates a formatted version of the heading text that can be used as an ID, this is used as a fragment URL in links. Vendors have different implementations, and produce different slugs. The text from links are included in slugification.

markyMarkdown.tableOfContents.label.description: Add a label to the top of the Table of Contents.

markyMarkdown.tableOfContents.updateOnSa.description: Update the Table of Contents automatically when the document is saved.
